content: Right at the end of this path, you'll find a Turtle Treasure guarding a chest. This Turtle Treasure holds a Spirit for you to collect once you've beaten it. After grabbing the Turtle Treasure Spirit, open the chest to collect Kun Steel, Knot of Voidness, and Medicines.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Right at the end of this path, you'll find a Turtle Treasure guarding a chest. This Turtle Treasure holds a Spirit for you to collect once you've beaten it. After grabbing the Turtle Treasure Spirit, open the chest to collect Kun Steel, Knot of Voidness, and Medicines.
